fixes.name: Delta/Vega Title
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Type] = "Vol Surface", "Vega", SELECTEDVALUE('DV01 or Swap Spread'[Display As]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF. Transformed [Market Type] to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Type] and replaced [Parameters].[DV01 or Swap Spread] with SELECTEDVALUE('DV01 or Swap Spread'[Display As]) per parameter mapping rules.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[DV01 or Swap Spread]); per rules, parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
